user.description: Choose the domains to be included. All supported entities in the domain will be included except for categorised entities. A separate HomeKit instance in accessory mode will be created for each tv media player, activity based remote, lock, and camera.

exclude.description: All “{domains}” entities will be included except for the excluded entities and categorised entities.

include.description: Select entities from each domain in “{domains}”. The include will cover the entire domain if you do not select any entities for a given domain.

unpair.description: Forcefully removes all pairings from an accessory to allow re-pairing. Use this service if the accessory is no longer responsive, and you want to avoid deleting and re-adding the entry. Room locations, and accessory preferences will be lost.
